content.query:
/*
Unable to ALTER FILE FORMAT
See link https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/answers/questions/38287/alter-external-file-format-question.html
Supposed to be doable.


*/

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CSVFORMAT WITH 
    (  
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS 
            (
                FIRST_ROW=2,
                FIELD_TERMINATOR=',',
                STRING_DELIMITER='"'                
            )
    )

ALTER FILE FORMAT  CSVFORMAT 
ALTER   FILE FORMAT CSVFORMAT WITH 
    (  
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS 
            (
                FIRST_ROW=2,
                FIELD_TERMINATOR=',',
                STRING_DELIMITER='"'                
            )
    )
